errors.nameLength: Length must be from {min} to {max} characters
errors.userNameAlphaNumericUnderscore: Username must contain alphanumeric and underscore characters
errors.userNameStartsWithAlpha: Username must start with a letter
errors.passwordRule: The password must be between 5 and 30 characters long, contain at least one letter (uppercase or lowercase), include at least one number, and have at least one special character
